022
023package org.opt4j.core.genotype;
024
025import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.Collections;
028import java.util.HashSet;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Random;
031import java.util.Set;
032
033import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
034
035/**
036 * <p>
037 * The {@link IntegerMapGenotype} is a {@link IntegerGenotype} with the
038 * {@link MapGenotype} functionality.
039 * </p>
040 * <p>
041 * Example problem: Select the outcome of throwing five dice die<sub>1</sub>,
042 * die<sub>2</sub>, die<sub>3</sub>, die<sub>4</sub>, die<sub>5</sub><br/>
043 * Example usage: <blockquote>
044 * 
045 * <pre>
046 * IntegerGenotype&lt;Die&gt; genotype = new IntegerMapGenotype&lt;Die&gt;(Arrays.asList(die1, die2, die3, die4, die5), 1, 6);
047 * genotype.init(new Random());
048 * </pre>
049 * 
050 * </blockquote> Example instance: [die1=3, die2=5, die3=6, die4=1, die5=3]<br/>
051 * Example search space size: 6<sup>5</sup>
052 * </p>
053 * 
054 * @author lukasiewycz
055 * 
056 * @param <K>
057 *            the type of keys
058 */
059public class IntegerMapGenotype<K> extends IntegerGenotype implements MapGenotype<K, Integer> {
060
061        protected final List<K> list;
062
063        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
064
065        /**
066         * Constructs a {@link IntegerMapGenotype}.
067         * 
068         * @param list
069         *            the list of keys
070         * @param bounds
071         *            the lower and upper bounds
072         */
073        public IntegerMapGenotype(List<K> list, Bounds<Integer> bounds) {
074                super(bounds);
075                Set<K> uniqueKeys = new HashSet<>(list);
076                if (uniqueKeys.size() < list.size()) {
077                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_NON_UNIQUE_KEYS);
078                }
079                this.list = list;
080        }
081
082        /**
083         * Constructs a {@link IntegerMapGenotype} with fixed bounds.
084         * 
085         * @param list
086         *            the list of keys
087         * @param lowerBound
088         *            the lower bound
089         * @param upperBound
090         *            the upper bound
091         */
092        public IntegerMapGenotype(List<K> list, int lowerBound, int upperBound) {
093                super(lowerBound, upperBound);
094                Set<K> uniqueKeys = new HashSet<>(list);
095                if (uniqueKeys.size() < list.size()) {
096                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_NON_UNIQUE_KEYS);
097                }
098                this.list = list;
099        }
100
101        /**
102         * Initialize this genotype with random values based on the size of the
103         * {@code list}.
104         * 
105         * @param random
106         *            the random number generator
107         */
108        public void init(Random random) {
109                super.init(random, list.size());
110        }
111
112        /**
113         * Not supported. Use {@link IntegerMapGenotype#init(Random)} instead.
114         * 
115         * @see org.opt4j.core.genotype.IntegerGenotype#init(java.util.Random, int)
116         */
117        @Override
118        public void init(Random random, int n) {
119                throw new UnsupportedOperationException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_UNSUPPORTED_INIT);
120        }
121
122        /*
123         * (non-Javadoc)
124         * 
125         * @see org.opt4j.genotype.MapGenotype#containsKey(java.lang.Object)
126         */
127        @Override
128        public boolean containsKey(K key) {
129                return list.contains(key);
130        }
131
132        /*
133         * (non-Javadoc)
134         * 
135         * @see org.opt4j.genotype.MapGenotype#getValue(java.lang.Object)
136         */
137        @Override
138        public Integer getValue(K key) {
139                if (!containsKey(key)) {
140                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_INVALID_KEY);
141                }
142                int i = list.indexOf(key);
143                return get(i);
144        }
145
146        /*
147         * (non-Javadoc)
148         * 
149         * @see org.opt4j.genotype.MapGenotype#setValue(java.lang.Object,
150         * java.lang.Object)
151         */
152        @Override
153        public void setValue(K key, Integer value) {
154                if (!containsKey(key)) {
155                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_INVALID_KEY);
156                }
157                int i = list.indexOf(key);
158                while (size() <= i) {
159                        add(bounds.getLowerBound(size()));
160                }
161                if (bounds.getLowerBound(i) > value || bounds.getUpperBound(i) < value) {
162                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_OUT_OF_BOUNDS);
163                }
164                set(i, value);
165        }
166
167        /*
168         * (non-Javadoc)
169         * 
170         * @see org.opt4j.core.Genotype#newInstance()
171         */
172        @Override
173        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
174        public <G extends Genotype> G newInstance() {
175                try {
176                        Constructor<? extends IntegerMapGenotype> cstr = this.getClass().getConstructor(List.class, Bounds.class);
177                        return (G) cstr.newInstance(list, bounds);
178                } catch (Exception e) {
179                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
180                }
181        }
182
183        /*
184         * (non-Javadoc)
185         * 
186         * @see java.util.AbstractCollection#toString()
187         */
188        @Override
189        public String toString() {
190                StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();
191                stringBuilder.append("[");
192                for (int i = 0; i < size(); i++) {
193                        K key = list.get(i);
194                        int value = this.get(i);
195                        stringBuilder.append(key + "=" + value + ";");
196                }
197                stringBuilder.append("]");
198                return stringBuilder.toString();
199        }
200
201        /*
202         * (non-Javadoc)
203         * 
204         * @see org.opt4j.genotype.MapGenotype#getIndexOf(java.lang.Object)
205         */
206        @Override
207        public int getIndexOf(K key) {
208                if (!containsKey(key)) {
209                        throw new IllegalArgumentException(MapGenotype.ERROR_MESSAGE_INVALID_KEY);
210                }
211                return list.indexOf(key);
212        }
213
214        /*
215         * (non-Javadoc)
216         * 
217         * @see org.opt4j.genotype.MapGenotype#getKeys()
218         */
219        @Override
220        public Collection<K> getKeys() {
221                return Collections.unmodifiableList(list);
222        }
223}
